title: League Of Legends cinematic montage (Kaskade - Disarm you ft llsey)

embed.description: short cinematic montage that i quickly made and i hope you like and subscribe. share this video and please support the artist of the song that i used. Song: Kaskade | Disarm You ft Ilsey Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qen7he4Y7c iTunes - http://smarturl.it/DisarmYou_IT Beatport - http://smarturl.it/DisarmYou_BP SoundCloud: http://smarturl.it/KaskadeSoundcloud Facebook: http://smarturl.it/KaskadeFB

replies.body:
someone else posted the exact same thing like a week or 2 ago.

and it looks like it was made in premiere pro, because it has a visual bug that software is known to have
What bug is that? I didn't notice anything
the video relapses and does a brief repeat of a previous scene instead of a smooth flow, usually just before the dissolve transition ends
